SharedMem:
["Janet and Monica are planning to go on a trip to the lake.", 
"They decide to invite their friend Brittany too.", 
"However, Brittany decides to join them after the picnic."]
ScenarioPremise: Brittany says: “I know where you live"
Options:
["To ask if they will meet at her house",
"To say that she will return the money immediately",
"To wait for an answer",
"To say that they will wait for her at home"]
LcGoal: Brittany wants to join her friends after the picnic
LcContext: Brittany lent some money to Janet
LcSpecificMem: Brittany wants to join her friends at Janet's house
IlcGoal: Janet wants to stay with her friends
IlcContext: Janet forgot to pay back the money Brittany lent her
IlcSpecificMem: Janet remembered that she didn't pay Brittany back the money she lent her
IlcExtras: Janet is waiting for Brittany with her friend Monica
Illocutor_answer: To say that she will return the money immediately
